name: GAL. 001
description:
Welcome to GAL. 001, a proof of concept for a minimalist art gallery made entirely in Bitsy, containing 3 rooms, each with 4 works of art.

WASD or arrow keys to move. Swipe on mobile.

Download the official GAL. 001 program below, or view it here.

Song is "Computer Vision" by 0PN.
